title: Live from Vegas with Prisco, Kostos, Brinson, Johnny OddsShark (Part 1) (Football 08/07)
description:
Will Brinson, Nick Kostos and Pete Prisco spent the weekend hanging out in Las Vegas and managed to carve out enough time to break down every single division heading into the NFL season. In this part 1 episode from the OddsShark suite at Caesar's Palace, they break down all the AFC divisions.
